name: Paper Doll
description:
Paper Doll is a fictional story about a teenage trans girl learning what it means to be a woman, told partly through a dress-up game.

It's a short game. There's about 4000 words of writing and 3 scenes.

Hope you like it!

Controls:

Drag/Click to do things

Escape to quit

Warning for: references to misogyny, transmisogyny specifically, and references to violence.
